author: Sun-Times
title: Georgia Nicols horoscopes for Oct. 24
text:
Georgia Nicols horoscopes for Oct. 24 Sun-Times on October 24, 2015 Moon Alert 
Caution: After 6 a.m. Chicago time, avoid shopping or important decisions. The Moon is in Pisces. Aries (March 21-April 19) 
In the month ahead, your feelings about everything will be more intense than usual. In addition, your focus will be on matters related to shared property, inheritances, taxes, debt and insurance issues. Expect to work hard to clear up loose ends in these areas. Taurus (April 20-May 20) 
For the next four weeks, the Sun is opposite your sign. This is the only time all year this occurs, and because the Sun is your source of energy, you will need more sleep. You’ll feel tired and exhausted. But not too tired to party! Ah yes, you love the good life! Gemini (May 21-June 20) 
You have decided it’s time to pull your act together before you take it on the road. In the next month, you will work to be efficient, effective and productive. You want to make your actions count because you want bang for your buck. You might focus on your health more than usual. Cancer (June 21-July 22) 
You can look forward to a playful four weeks ahead! Parties, social occasions, sports events, musical performances, the theater, playful times with children plus romance, romance, romance will be top billing for your sign! This is a productive time for creative people. Leo (July 23-Aug. 22) 
Now your focus turns to home, family and your personal life. It will remain this way for the next four weeks. Along with this, you will work hard to earn money because you’re working almost as hard to spend it. Ka-ching! Virgo (Aug. 23-Sept. 22) 
The pace of your days will accelerate during the next four weeks so get ready for this. Expect a jam-packed schedule with short trips, errands, conversations with everyone, plus increased reading, writing and studying. Libra (Sept. 23-Oct. 22) 
Your focus will turn to money, earnings, cash flow and your job. (With the holiday season approaching, we are all wondering where the money will come from.) But at a deeper level, in the next four weeks, you will be thinking about your values. Scorpio (Oct. 23-Nov. 21) 
The Sun will now be in your sign for the next four weeks. This will give you a wonderful boost of energy, and at the same time attract people and favorable circumstances to you. Time to recharge your batteries for the rest of the year! Sagittarius (Nov. 22-Dec. 21) 
Because your birthday is a month away, your personal year is coming to an end. That means in the next four weeks, it will be appropriate for you to do some planning or strategizing about what you want your new year to be all about. Ideas? Capricorn (Dec. 22-Jan. 19) 
The next four weeks will be social for you! Everyone wants to see your face. Plan on lots of activities. Accept all invitations and enjoy the company of others. This is also a good time to share your hopes and dreams for the future with a friend to get their input. Aquarius (Jan. 20-Feb. 18) 
The Sun is at the top of your chart for the next four weeks. This is the only time all year this happens, and it acts like a flattering spotlight on you (which is why everyone will think you’re so great). This is why people will thrust increased responsibilities on you. Pisces (Feb. 19-March 20) 
Your desire to travel and push your boundaries will be strong in the next four weeks. Obviously, if you can travel, by all means do so. But do something to shake things up. Take a course, be a tourist in your own city, learn something new! If Your Birthday Is Today 
Actress Katie McGrath (1983) shares your birthday today. You are a dedicated and hard-working perfectionist. This is why you give painstaking attention to detail. You also know how to charm everyone, often with flamboyant antics. Settle your debts this year to prepare for financial accumulation in the next three years. To clear away indebtedness is the thrust of this year. Consolidate your affairs for future growth.
